subject: Junit suggestions
msgSnippet: Hi, I every now & then manage to create TestCase that have the following inconsistency : setUp () & tearDown () implicitely rely on action happening in the
messageBody:
Hi,

I every now & then manage to create TestCase that have the following
inconsistency :
setUp () & tearDown () implicitely rely on action happening in the
"test".

This is due to the fact that I break the law of "small methods" but ... may
be JUnit could call once setUp () & tearDown () before calling the first
test ?

Thomas,

--

Thomas SMETS
rue J. Wytsmanstraat 62
1050 Brussel - Bruxelles
